    LD block view summary table

    RunTorusFDR

    annotator()

    Each annotation gets assigned SNPs based on overlap

    annotator_merged()

    Annotations for causal SNPs (apply these after fine-mapping!)

    assign.locus.snp()

    Assigns each SNP to one ld-block

    clean_sumstats()

    Clean summary statistics

    compute_gene_pip()

    Map SNPs to genes and assign weights

    extract_gene_level_result()

    Extract gene-level result from SNP-level gene mapping result

    filter_coaccess()

    Filtering coaccessibility data

    find_nearest_genes()

    Find nearest genes (by distance to TSS or gene body)

    gene_by_distance()

    Find all genes (promoters) within 1MB genes and assign weights based on distance

    gene_cs()

    Get gene credible sets from SNP level gene mapping table

    gene_manhattan_plot()

    Make gene manhattan plot

    gene_view_summary()

    Gene view summary table

    load_narrowpeaks()

    Load ENCODE narrow peak data and convert to a GRanges object

    make_genomic_annots()

    Make genomic annotations from GTF file

    merge_susie_sumstats()

    merges susie results with original summary statistics data frame

    partition_pip_annots()

    Partition PIPs into functional categories

    partition_pip_regions()

    Partition PIPs into functional annotation regions

    process_ABC()

    Process ABC scores and save as a GRanges object

    process_finemapping_sumstat()

    Process fine mapping summary statistics data

    process_pcHiC()

    Process pcHiC data and save as a GRanges object

    run.susie()

    run SUSIE

    snp_view_summary()

    SNP view summary table

    structure_plot()

    structure plot

    substract_exons()

    Substract all exon coordinates from all gene coordinates to get all intron coordinates

    sum_pip_annots()

    Sum PIPs for each annotation category

    sum_pip_regions()

    Sum PIPs for genomic regions
